website_summaries.verdict: So much more than just a ball pit, this set will keep little ones busy for hours on end. Unbeatable value for money.
pros: Large setup includes ball pit, tunnel, and tent/playhouse
Extended configuration promotes movement necessary for muscle development and improves motor skills
Roomy ball pit features a basketball hoop
See-through mesh panels are breathable and offer hassle-free supervision
cons: Takes up quite a bit of space, however, the ball pit and tent can always be used separately

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy until toddlers figure out they can move it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy until toddlers figure out they can move it and when they start getting destructive. If the child doesn't figure out how to lift their legs when they crawl, then they end up dragging it into itself. I used this for a few months and then ended up opting for toys that were harder and plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: kids like this but string that attaches the tube to the ...
customer_reviews.text: kids like this but string that attaches the tube to the tent and ball pit are extremely cheap i’ve had this for a few days and already all have just popped off and broke.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not suitable for young children
customer_reviews.text: Well it lasted 45 days :( just outside of the return window! Wires poping out everywhere! Totally unsafe for my 16 mo old. He is a little rough on it but stinks.
customer_reviews.author: ReePhoen

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 year old niece. Bought 200pk balls to go with it. This is plenty for her she and size. If you have an older toddler then you could do more balls for the ball pit.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Messer

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend this if you have a big room for your ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend this if you have a big room for your kid. My son loves this so much and now he's willing to stay in there to play by himself. Quality looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome! My 5 and 1 year olds play nicely
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! My 5 and 1 year olds play nicely! It folds well and ties it unties as needed. Great price and product!
customer_reviews.author: Christine BaurMillward

customer_reviews.title: She loved it but you do have to buy the balls ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughters first Christmas, a 1 year old, She loved it but you do have to buy the balls separate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my daughter but the ball pit part is ...
customer_reviews.text: Fun for my daughter but the ball pit part is a pain in the ass to put away but all in all well worth buying
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Pass this by
customer_reviews.text: My children enjoy it. It's the type of thing to get if you want something for the kids to play with but not care if it gets destroyed. It feels like one of those cheap dollar store Halloween capes. The strings tying the tube to the ball pit broke the same day it was given to the kids (Christmas Day) and 3 days later the metal coil that gives the tube shape broke through the fabric and almost hit my eldest in the face. I'm not sure if it was a fluke or what but it scared the crap out of me. The ball pit and play tent still appear in good condition. I honestly can not recommend this though.
customer_reviews.author: Shellbie M. Melby

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all.
customer_reviews.text: I am glad we bought this product; gets lots of use, good size and easily to build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was my grandaughter's favorite gift at her first birthday party. #mimiisthebest
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Fun big play set
customer_reviews.text: This set is pretty well made and sturdy enough for my 2 kids. It is a pop uo tent so if they get too rowdy they can knock it over but overall is pretty good. The 3 peices tie together easily and stay together duringplay time. When assembled the set takes up alot of space so if you do not have a big open area you may want to consider a smaller tent. The tents are all very light weight so outside play is limited on windy days. the peices all fold up with little effort and fit into one bag that is small enough to store under a bed or in a closet when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, very fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, very fast shipping, product is as described, it does not include the balls
customer_reviews.author: Rockstar customer

product_meta.title: Sonyabecca Kids Tent, 3 in 1 Play Tent Ball Pit Tent with Carry Case House Crawl Tunnel Indoor Outdoor Playground with Ball Hoop for Boys Girls Gift
feature_bullets: Roomy. Consist of Tent house, tunnel and ball pool. Independent open room with window for kids to crawl and play, improve baby's independent ability. BALLS NOT INCLUDED.
Eco-Friendly and durable. Meet toy safety standards. Odor-free. Ensure a safe environment for children. Perfect for indoor or outdoor play.
Breathable tulle design with colorful polka dot printed. Good transmittance .Visualize the view inside for watching out. Mosquito-proof.

Durable and firm. This tent with tunnel adopts high-strength environment friendly steel holder with excessive flexibility. 100% doubly- sewed and washable polyester fabric is highly resistant to wear and tear.

Portable. Quick & Easy to set up, fold, move and store. Fold-Pop-up for quick assemble. Lightweight with a zipper storage bag. WARNING: WATCH OUT ELASTIC BOUNCING WHEN OPENING. Size:117"(L) X 47"(W) X 39"(H) (use together); folded size: 20"(D). Ideal for home, backyard, parks, parties, day care and more. Folding method, please refer to the link:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nHx4H4j3JWE
